1523450.name: aerofly RC 8 - Expansion Pack 1
1523450.description:
This aerofly RC 8 Expansion Pack 1 includes 90 new aircraft models and 20 additional sceneries.

It focusses primarily on aerobatic and high performance aircraft for the pilot training.
This is the right addition to your aerofly RC 8 if you want to become a better pilot in the next competition or if you want to want to explore new aircraft categories and have a ton of fun whilst improving your skills.

The Expansion Pack 1 adds 90 new aircraft with the primary focus on your flying skills. It offers lots of 3D and competition aerobatic aircraft, 3D helicopters, multi-copters, gyrocopters, fun-flyers and high performance gliders and aerobatic aircraft.

Choose from 20 exciting new sceneries that challenge your flying skills in new ways. This Expansion Pack 1 offers new 4D sceneries like a racecourse and aircraft carrier, multiple indoor sceneries, Las Vegas night flying scenery, several slope soaring scenes and of course popular model airfields.
